RESOURCE.NAME: EDT Monitor
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Warns whenever an AWT component is updated from anywhere other than the event dispatch thread

RESOURCE.NAME: Java Heap Dumper
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Dumps the Java heap to the specified file

RESOURCE.NAME: Log4J Level: ALL
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Allows the Log4J log level to be set to ALL from within the GUI

RESOURCE.NAME: Show/Hide Resources
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Show resources that would otherwise be hidden, e.g. resources created for internal use by other resources

RESOURCE.NAME: The Duplicator
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Duplicate any resource with a right click menu option

RESOURCE.NAME: Unload Unused Plugins
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Unloads all plugins for which we cannot find any loaded instances
